# PIP_ID::HEADER
# Python dependencies for RTX-accelerated debt management assistant

# PIP_DEP::TRANSFORMERS
# Hugging Face Transformers for model support
transformers==4.38.0

# PIP_DEP::TORCH
# PyTorch with CUDA support for RTX acceleration
torch==2.1.0+cu121 --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu121

# PIP_DEP::ACCELERATE
# Hugging Face Accelerate for faster GPU inference
accelerate==0.24.0

# PIP_DEP::GPU_OPTIMIZATION
# GPU optimization tools
bitsandbytes==0.41.0
triton==2.1.0
ninja==1.11.1

# PIP_DEP::UTILITIES
# Utility libraries
numpy==1.24.3
pyyaml==6.0.1
tqdm==4.66.1

# PIP_DEP::API
# API support with optimization
fastapi==0.104.1
uvicorn[standard]==0.23.2

# PIP_DEP::MEMORY_MANAGEMENT
# Memory management for large models
psutil==5.9.5
nvidia-ml-py==11.525.131
